title: I’m Acting Gay on a Dating Show - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Charismatic Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   e-Sports   Friends Become Enemies   Friendship   Genius Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Loner Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Li Siwei   李思危
description:
Shen Yang joined a reality show focusing on authentic relationships between ordinary people. He worked hard to pick up girls, but didn’t think……he’d be picked up instead!

Shen Yang: I am a straight man.

Su Hanying: Get in the car; I’ll take you to school.

Shen Yang: I really am a straight man!

Su Hanying: Here’s my card, buy whatever you want.

Shen Yang: ……

Viewer A: Su-ge’s driving skills are top-notch! Shen-mei, get in the car!

Viewer B: Help! Shen-mei’s about to cheat, go get him, Su-ge!

Viewer C: Wow, I’m clearly here to appreciate the romance and drama between hot guys and pretty girls, but why has my sight been stolen by a pair of dog men?

This is a story about the whole world watching two boys act gay on a dating show, and also the story of a fallen Polaris regaining its light.>
